name: Extract DMN/ECN
description: Extract Default Mode Network and Executive Control Network regions from ROI time series

inputs.name: ROI Time Series
inputs.description: Full ROI time series (e.g., 300 parcels) [ROIS × TIME]

outputs.name: DMN/ECN Time Series
outputs.description: Filtered time series containing only DMN (58) and ECN (48) regions [106 × TIME]

parameters.name: DMN Indices
parameters.description: Indices of DMN regions (auto-detected from Schaefer atlas, 58 regions)

parameters.name: ECN Indices
parameters.description: Indices of ECN regions (auto-detected from Schaefer atlas, 48 regions)

shapeNotes: Output always has 106 ROIs: 58 DMN + 48 ECN from Schaefer 300P 17N atlas
